Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Many of the north trails are rolled. It's a bit soft for skating but manageable. I suggest rock skis since there are sections with a "carpet" of twigs and tall grass. It's decent for Dec. 1 so get out and ski while the temps permit...

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob is not yet open for its down hill program : coming this weekend . But the groomers jumped the gun on the Nordic Trails . Access through Valley road to the red and blue loops are currently primo !

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are being packed today. Not open for skiing as we prepare trails.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today as we focus on snowmaking. We will be open for skiing and riding December 6 and 7 from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. for our first two days of the ski season. Thanks to the Nub's Nob Snow Farmers and some natural snow we should be in very good shape for this opening weekend. Stay tuned for more details including a run count over the next few days. See you on the slopes next weekend!
